filters.name: EasyList
filters.description: EasyList is the primary subscription that removes adverts from web pages in English. Already included in AdGuard Base filter.

filters.name: ABPindo
filters.description: Indonesian supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Bulgarian list
filters.description: Bulgarian supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: EasyList China
filters.description: Chinese supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: EasyList Czech and Slovak
filters.description: Czech and Slovak supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: EasyList Dutch
filters.description: Dutch supplement for EasyList. Already included in AdGuard Dutch filter.

filters.name: EasyList Germany
filters.description: German supplement for EasyList. Already included in AdGuard German filter.

filters.name: EasyList Hebrew
filters.description: Hebrew supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: EasyList Italy
filters.description: Italian supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: EasyList Lithuania
filters.description: Lithuanian supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Latvian List
filters.description: Latvian supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Liste AR
filters.description: Arabic supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Liste FR
filters.description: French supplement for EasyList. Already included in AdGuard French filter.

filters.name: ROList
filters.description: Romanian supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: EasyPrivacy
filters.description: Privacy protection supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Icelandic ABP List
filters.description: Icelandic supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: AdBlockID
filters.description: Indonesian supplement for EasyList and AdGuard Base filter.

filters.name: Greek AdBlock Filter
filters.description: Greek supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Fanboy's Annoyances
filters.description: Removes in-page pop-ups and other annoyances. Includes Fanboy's Social Blocking & EasyList Cookie Lists.

filters.name: Fanboy's Social Blocking List
filters.description: Hides and blocks social content, social widgets, social scripts and social icons. Already included in Fanboy's Annoyances list.

filters.name: Web Annoyances Ultralist
filters.description: Blocks annoying web elements and reclaims lost screen real estate.

filters.name: Thai Ads Filters
filters.description: Filter that blocks ads on Thai sites.

filters.name: Hungarian filter
filters.description: Hufilter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the Hungarian language.

filters.name: Peter Lowe's Blocklist
filters.description: Filter that blocks ads, trackers, and other nasty things.

filters.name: Xfiles
filters.description: Italian adblock filter list.

filters.name: Adblock Warning Removal List
filters.description: Removes anti-adblock warnings and other obtrusive messages.

filters.name: Online Malicious URL Blocklist
filters.description: Blocks domains that are known to be used to propagate malware and spyware.

filters.name: RU AdList: Counters
filters.description: RU AdList supplement for trackers blocking.

filters.name: ABPVN List
filters.description: Vietnamese adblock filter list.

filters.name: Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List
filters.description: Blocks common tracking scripts such as Omniture, Webtrends, Foresee, Coremetrics, Google Analytics, Touch Clarity and Channel Intelligence.

filters.name: Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard
filters.description: Polish supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters
filters.description: Polish filter list for cookies blocking.

filters.name: Estonian List
filters.description: Filter for ad blocking on Estonian sites.

filters.name: ChinaList+EasyList
filters.description: Adblocking list for China. Note that it does not actually include EasyList.

filters.name: CJX's Annoyances List
filters.description: Supplement for EasyList China+EasyList and EasyPrivacy.

filters.name: Polish Social Filters
filters.description: Polish filter list for social widgets, popups, etc.

filters.name: Adblock-Persian list
filters.description: Persian ad blocking filter list.

filters.name: Fanboy's Swedish
filters.description: Filter list for websites in Swedish.

filters.name: Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List
filters.description: Warning, it will break Facebook-based comments on some websites and may also break some Facebook apps or games.

filters.name: Fanboy's Vietnamese
filters.description: Filter list for websites in Vietnamese.

filters.name: List-KR
filters.description: Filter that removes ads and various scripts from websites with Korean content. Based on Corset, Korean Adblock filter, Youslist. Combined and augmented with AdGuard-specific rules for enhanced filtering. This filter is expected to be used alongside with AdGuard Base filter.

filters.name: xinggsf
filters.description: Blocks ads on the Chinese video platforms (MangoTV, DouYu and others).

filters.name: I don't care about cookies
filters.description: Hides annoying cookie warnings from almost all websites and saves you from unnecessary clicks.

filters.name: Fanboy's Spanish/Portuguese
filters.description: Filter list for websites in Spanish and Portuguese

filters.name: EasyList Spanish
filters.description: Spanish supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: KAD - Anti-Scam
filters.description: Filter that protects against various types of scams in the Polish network, such as mass text messaging, fake online stores, etc.

filters.name: Adblock List for Finland
filters.description: Finnish ad blocking filter list.

filters.name: ROLIST2
filters.description: This is a complementary list for ROList with annoyances that are not necessarily banners. It is a very aggressive list and not recommended for beginners.

filters.name: Iranian filter
filters.description: Ad blocking rules for Iranian/Persian websites.

filters.name: road-block light
filters.description: Romanian ad blocking filter subscription.

filters.name: Polish Annoyances Filters
filters.description: Filter list that hides and blocks pop-ups, widgets, newsletters, push notifications, arrows, tagged internal links that are off-topic, and other irritating elements. Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters is already in it.

filters.name: Polish Anti Adblock Filters
filters.description: Official Polish filters against Adblock alerts.

filters.name: Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts
filters.description: A filter that blocks third-party fonts. It may break the look and design of some websites.

filters.name: EasyList Cookie List
filters.description: Removes cookie and privacy warnings. Already included in Fanboy's Annoyances list.

filters.name: NoCoin Filter List
filters.description: This filter disables browser-based miners such as coin-hive.

filters.name: Frellwit's Swedish Filter
filters.description: A filter for uBlock Origin that aims to remove regional Swedish ads, tracking, social media, annoyances, sponsored articles etc.

filters.name: YousList
filters.description: Filter that blocks ads on Korean sites.

filters.name: AlleBlock
filters.description: Filter that removes annoying elements from Polish e-commerce sites.

filters.name: EasyList Polish
filters.description: Polish supplement for EasyList.

filters.name: Polish Anti-Annoying Special Supplement
filters.description: Filters that block and hide RSS elements and remnants of hidden newsletters combined with social elements on Polish websites.

filters.name: Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters
filters.description: This list covers websites for Norway, Denmark, Iceland, Danish territories, and the Sami indigenous population.

filters.name: Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List
filters.description: This list is made in the style of AdGuard's and Fanboy's annoyances lists. It combines many of Dandelion Sprout's proudest and most frequently maintained international lists, as a curated compilation for simplicity's sake.

filters.name: Legitimate URL Shortener
filters.description: Automatically removes unnecessary '$' and '&' values from URLs, making them easier to copy from the URL bar and pasting elsewhere as links.

filters.name: Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion
filters.description: Filter that unblocks search (Duckduckgo, Google, Bing, Yahoo) and self-promo ads. Self-promotion definition: when an ad on a website is promoting this very website or other websites/social media/etc closely related to it, such ad is considered a self-promoting one.

filters.name: AdGuard Mobile Ads filter
filters.description: Filter for all known mobile ad networks. Useful for mobile devices.

filters.name: AdGuard Turkish filter
filters.description: Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in Turkish language.

filters.name: AdGuard Annoyances filter
filters.description: Blocks irritating elements on web pages including cookie notices, third-party widgets and in-page pop-ups.

filters.name: AdGuard DNS filter
filters.description: Filter composed of several other filters (AdGuard Base filter, Social Media filter, Tracking Protection filter, Mobile Ads filter, EasyList and EasyPrivacy) and simplified specifically to be better compatible with DNS-level ad blocking.

filters.name: AdGuard French filter
filters.description: Liste FR + AdGuard French filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in French language.

filters.name: AdGuard URL Tracking filter
filters.description: Filter that enhances privacy by removing tracking parameters from URLs.

filters.name: AdGuard Russian filter
filters.description: Filter that enables ad blocking on websites in Russian language.

filters.name: AdGuard Chinese filter
filters.description: EasyList China + AdGuard Chinese filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in Chinese language.

filters.name: AdGuard Base filter
filters.description: EasyList + AdGuard English filter. This filter is necessary for quality ad blocking.

filters.name: AdGuard Tracking Protection filter
filters.description: The most comprehensive list of various online counters and web analytics tools. Use this filter if you do not want your actions on the Internet to be tracked.

filters.name: AdGuard Social Media filter
filters.description: Filter for social media widgets such as 'Like' and 'Share' buttons and more.

filters.name: AdGuard Experimental filter
filters.description: Filter designed to test certain hazardous filtering rules before they are added to the basic filters.

filters.name: AdGuard German filter
filters.description: EasyList Germany + AdGuard German filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in German language.

filters.name: AdGuard Japanese filter
filters.description: Filter that enables ad blocking on websites in Japanese language.

filters.name: AdGuard Dutch filter
filters.description: EasyList Dutch + AdGuard Dutch filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in Dutch language.

filters.name: AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter
filters.description: Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in Spanish and Portuguese languages.
